website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenPad Z8 for Verizon Wireless is a relatively affordable Android tablet with a sharp display and solid performance, but you'll get more for your money elsewhere if you don't need a tablet with cellular connectivity.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet. Replaced my much loved Nexus 7. Fantastic quality picture for tv watching. Had a couple of blips setting it up and rang ASUS helpline who just said reset to factory settings. Now it's set up I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Android tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is excellent. It has a fast processor, decent memory and good battery life. It is VERY thin, yet well-built, and looks very attractive, too. I would thoroughly recommend this product if you want an inexpensive Android tablet that delivers all round.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother this being her first tablet. From an Ipad owner I am well impressed with this Asus tablet. Easy to use functions, lots of memory to run apps.
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very satisfied with the tablet
customer_reviews.text: My Asus Z580c arrived sooner than expected. So far I am very satisfied with the tablet.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Nice little device. Maybe it's not a speed demon but it does what it supposed to do. No lagging browsing on the internet, most apps is running fine, camera is just average but being honest - who buys a tablet for the purpose of taking snaps? Overall I am quite happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Atom 3530 CPU NOT Atom 3560 CPU
customer_reviews.text: Brief review / note for the time being. Just received, very nice premium quality feel and experience in the 30 mins i've played with. PLEASE TAKE NOTE: The tablet is quoted as having the ATOM 3560 CPU. I can confirm it is actually the ATOM 3530 CPU and NOT the ATOM 3560 CPU as advertised. This is from the now depleted amazon stock. I can't comment on the remaining stock available only via independent sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time waster
customer_reviews.text: Product not as advertised. Beware. Check before you buy... otherwise you will end up with hassles and time wasting.
customer_reviews.author: SatGov

customer_reviews.title: Beware - You cannot add extra Users.
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad tablet but I wish to make potential purchasers aware that you cannot add extra Users i.e. your children, as Asus have disabled this function. Why? No idea. But it cannot only be used by one user. It is a standard of Android from some version up that Users can be added, but Asus decided not to allow this. If I had know this I would not have bought two of these tablets. Overall though the tablet is OK and once set up works OK but the lack of being able to add a User gives me major problems when I wish to allow my grandchildren access on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis
